0: The grounds are great with a terrific set of pools including a fun waterslide water features and easy beach access

Lovely room great restaurants lovely spa good location beautiful beach and pool area
The moment we arrived we noticed the openness of the lobby and the views of the gardens pools and ocean that greeted us
The pool beach service was great
place is very clean pool is nice and slide is fun for all ages
The pool area was nice and we all loved the slide
Highly recommend the Hyat for discriminating traveller who is looking for comfort cleanliness value location service and an outstanding pool and beachfront
We found the free beach and pool spots perfect for us
Staff is friendly and the pools beach is wonderful

Too many children in the pool area with diapers
